HomePage.heroTitle: AegisPad: Your Intelligent Markdown Editor & Tools
HomePage.heroSubtitle: Refine, translate, and prepare your content for publishing on HIVE with smart tools.
HomePage.featuresTitle: Tools to Enhance and Publish Your Content
HomePage.feature2Description: Perfect your texts. Our AI can review and enhance your existing articles, suggesting improvements and polishing your message.
HomePage.feature3Description: Break language barriers. Translate your articles into multiple languages quickly and accurately, expanding your reach.
HomePage.geminiApiTitle: Powered by Gemini: Free and Easy Access
HomePage.geminiApiIntro: AegisPad utilizes Google's powerful Gemini API for its artificial intelligence features, offering you cutting-edge results.
HomePage.geminiApiGetFree: To use the AI features, you'll need your own Gemini API Key. You can get one for free from <link>Google AI Studio</link>.
HomePage.geminiApiFreeTier: Great news! With Gemini's free tier, you get approximately 1 million tokens per month at no cost, enough for a vast amount of content enhancement!
HomePage.tokenEstimationIntro: Understanding token consumption helps you manage your free quota and plan your work efficiently.
HomePage.tokenEstimationMonthly: With 1 million free tokens per month, you could, for example, perform hundreds of revisions and translations.
HomePage.tokenEstimationNote: Note: These are estimates. Actual usage may vary based on content complexity, length, and the specific Gemini model used.

TestingsPage.title: Hive Keychain Test Page
TestingsPage.keychainNotDetected: Hive Keychain not detected. You need to install the extension to use this functionality.
TestingsPage.installLink: üîó Click here to install Hive Keychain
TestingsPage.websiteLink: üåê Visit the official Hive Keychain website
TestingsPage.dataPlaceholder: Data to encrypt (e.g., your API key)
TestingsPage.tooltipEncryptionBody: Hive Keychain uses AES-256 (derived from your Hive keys via ECDH) to protect this data. The '#' prefix indicates an encrypted message.
TestingsPage.tooltipSecurityBody: Brute-forcing this is infeasible. Security depends on the custody of your Hive private key. If your private key is compromised, this data can be decrypted. KEEP YOUR HIVE KEYS SAFE!
TestingsPage.storageNote: This is the string that will be stored locally (encrypted).
TestingsPage.alertInputsRequired: Please enter a Hive username and data to encrypt.

GeminiKeyManagerErrors.keychainNotAvailableEncode: Hive Keychain is not available for encoding.
GeminiKeyManagerErrors.inputsRequiredEncode: Username and data to encode are required.
GeminiKeyManagerErrors.encodeProcessFailed: Encoding did not alter data or format is unexpected.
GeminiKeyManagerErrors.keychainNotAvailableDecode: Hive Keychain is not available for decoding.
GeminiKeyManagerErrors.inputsRequiredDecode: Username and encoded data are required and cannot be empty.
GeminiKeyManagerErrors.decodeProcessFailed: Decoding did not produce the expected result or format is incorrect.
GeminiKeyManagerErrors.errorInvalidEncodedFormat: Invalid data format for encoding. Cannot be just '#' followed by spaces.

FaqPage.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FaqPage.sampleQ1Content: AegisPad is an intelligent tool that helps you refine and translate content, and prepare it for publishing on HIVE, using the power of Gemini AI and securing your Gemini API key with Hive Keychain.
FaqPage.sampleQ2Title: How do I get a Gemini API Key?
FaqPage.sampleQ2Content: You can get a Gemini API Key for free from Google AI Studio. AegisPad uses this key to power its AI features. The free tier offers a generous amount of tokens for content revision and translations.
FaqPage.sampleQ3Title: How is my Gemini API key stored?
FaqPage.sampleQ3Content: Your Gemini API key, once provided, is encrypted using your Hive Keychain account (specifically, your Posting key) and stored locally in your browser's local storage. It is decrypted only when needed to interact with the Gemini API and is never sent to our servers unencrypted.
FaqPage.geminiApiUsageQuestion: How are tokens or the cost of using AI handled?
FaqPage.geminiApiUsageAnswer: Using AI features consumes tokens from your Gemini API key, and any associated costs are based on Google's pricing policy for the Gemini API. AegisPad attempts to display token usage to help you monitor this, but the ultimate responsibility for managing your API key usage and costs lies with you.
FaqPage.supportedLanguagesQuestion: In what languages can I revise, and translate articles?
FaqPage.supportedLanguagesAnswer: Article revision and translation can be performed in multiple languages, depending on Gemini's capabilities.
FaqPage.articleRevisionProcessAnswer: The AI reviews your article for grammar, style, clarity, and flow. It aims to provide an improved version while attempting to maintain the original Markdown formatting.
FaqPage.workSavingAnswer: Currently, on the 'Final Review' page, you can use the 'Save for Later' option, which saves your article to your browser's local storage. Please note this is temporary. Saving articles to the cloud or a database for more permanent storage is a planned future feature.
FaqPage.hivePublishingQuestion: Can I publish directly to Hive from AegisPad?
FaqPage.hivePublishingAnswer: The 'Publish to Hive' feature is planned and under development. For now, it serves as a placeholder, and direct publishing to Hive is not yet enabled.
FaqPage.betaFeedbackQuestion: This is a Beta version, how can I provide feedback or report bugs?
FaqPage.betaFeedbackAnswer: We highly value your input! You can share your thoughts, suggestions, or report any issues you encounter by visiting our Feedback page. You'll find a link to it in the website header.
FaqPage.betaVersionMeaningQuestion: What does it mean that the application is in Beta?
FaqPage.betaVersionMeaningAnswer: Being in Beta means AegisPad is in an early stage of release. You might encounter some bugs or find that some features are not yet fully implemented. Your feedback during this phase is crucial for us to improve the application.
FaqPage.dataPrivacyQuestion: Where are my articles and API key stored?
FaqPage.dataPrivacyAnswer: Your Gemini API key is encrypted using your HIVE account credentials and stored in our secure database, linked to your profile. If you use the 'Save for Later' feature on the 'Final Review' page, your article content is temporarily stored in your browser's local storage.

completed.title: Setup Complete! You're All Set!
completed.description: AegisPad is now configured with your HIVE account and Gemini API key. Here's how you can get started:
completed.step1AI: Let AI Create: Go to the editor, provide a topic or prompt, and let AegisPad's AI generate an initial draft for you.
completed.step2Manual: Write Yourself: Prefer to start manually? Choose 'I'll write the content myself' and begin crafting your article in the Markdown editor.
completed.step3Explore: Explore Features: Try out translation, content revision, and the different output formats available.

HiveLoginStep.title: Login with Your HIVE Account
HiveLoginStep.description: To securely manage your Gemini API key and potentially publish content, please log in with your HIVE account via Hive Keychain.
HiveLoginStep.howToCreateAccountButton: How to Create a HIVE Account?
HiveLoginStep.installKeychainPrompt: Please <link>install Hive Keychain</link> and refresh the page to continue, or learn how to create an account.
HiveLoginStep.learnToCreateAccountButton: Learn to Create a HIVE Account / Install Keychain

HiveAccountInfoStep.title: HIVE Account & Keychain Info
HiveAccountInfoStep.description: To use AegisPad, you'll need a HIVE account and the Hive Keychain browser extension.
HiveAccountInfoStep.infoText: Here are some resources to get you started:
HiveAccountInfoStep.createAccountEcency: Create a HIVE account with Ecency
HiveAccountInfoStep.createAccountHiveOnboard: Create a HIVE account with HiveOnboard
HiveAccountInfoStep.backToLoginButton: I Have an Account / Back to Login

ApiKeyInputStep.title: Enter Your Gemini API Key
ApiKeyInputStep.securityNoteDescription: Your Gemini API key will be encrypted using your HIVE account (@{username}) and stored securely only in your browser's local storage. AegisPad will never see or store your unencrypted key on its servers.
ApiKeyInputStep.apiKeyPlaceholder: Paste your Gemini API key here
ApiKeyInputStep.howToGetApiKeyButton: How to Get an API Key?

ApiKeyInfoStep.title: How to Get a Gemini API Key
ApiKeyInfoStep.description: Follow these simple steps to obtain your free Gemini API key from Google AI Studio.
ApiKeyInfoStep.step1: Visit the <link>Google AI Studio</link> and sign in with your Google account.
ApiKeyInfoStep.step2: Once logged in, click on 'Get API key' or navigate to the API key section.
ApiKeyInfoStep.step3: Create a new API key. Copy it and paste it into AegisPad in the previous step.
ApiKeyInfoStep.practice1: Keep your API key confidential. Do not share it publicly.
ApiKeyInfoStep.practice2: Consider restricting your API key to specific services if Google AI Studio allows.
ApiKeyInfoStep.practice3: {appName} will encrypt your key locally, but always be mindful of your key's security.
ApiKeyInfoStep.backToInputButton: I Have My API Key / Go Back
